subject: Re: SVG's
preview: Hi David, Yes all good, we had a long weekend here in Sydney. I'm getting across these email threads now with the team and will get back to you later today. Thanks for your patience.

full_threads.body:
Hi David,

Yes all good, we had a long weekend here in Sydney. I'm getting across these email threads now with the team and will get back to you later today. Thanks for your patience.

Hi Heath,

Can I just check if the messages are coming through ok, as I've not had a response since over a week ago?

Best regards,

David

David Barnes

Chief Product Officer

We are starting full end-to-end testing of the travel journey tomorrow so would be good to have these resolved.

@heath I have fixed the select dropdown. I moved from selectize.js to select2.js

My concern is when they select Minnesota and Mississippi any from United states.
They have the same value of "stella_li_united_states" it fails to go to the next screen cause the value is doubled.
There are 51 "stella_li_united_states" to the choices.

David

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Here's a doc with some feedback for the travel quick quote form
https://whimsical.com/wolf-feedback-BV5KQmsq66s9TyUY2MaB2x

The transfer URL is missing a parameter that directs the request to the product selection page.

Right now you have
https://stella-test.au.aventus.app/quote/new?quoteId=397d641e-5b39-9301-d764-e1df0023dc2b

it needs &autoNext
https://stella-test.au.aventus.app/quote/new?quoteId=397d641e-5b39-9301-d764-e1df0023dc2b&autoNext

Thank you
Simon
